StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [DeleteCampusContact]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@CampusContactID uniqueiden..er
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
--ENTITY TYPEID is 6
--IMPORTANT NOTE: Add begin and end transac.on
--Join with CollegePro.le to ensure only valid school_codes are entered in the PointOfContact table IF EXISTS (SELECT '1' from [MCRISS].[USMC].[CampusContact] where CampusContactID = @CampusContactID) BEGIN
Delete [MCRISS].[USMC].[CampusContact] where CampusContactID = @CampusContactID
END --- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
